page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: Law Primary School is the only school in Law. It has 257 pupils.It starts at 9a.m.and finishes at 3.30p.m.There are 9 classrooms in use,but we also have 3 quiet rooms,a tutorial room,a maths room,a television room,a music room,project areas and a library.At Christmas we hold 2 plays which are open to the public,1 being a nativity play,which the infants perform and the other the older children perform. We have first and second place prizes for P3-P6.P7 have 4 prizes.In all these classes there is also an endeavour prize.In P6 and P7 there are project prizes also.We have a school badminton team and they play in a school league.The school supplies the strips.For the past 6 years we have won the league pennant.
